This includes agreeing on programme sponsorship, confirming the programme mandate through approval of the conceptual business case, appointing programme board or committee members, producing the programme brief, reviewing and updating the business case, developing a benefits realisation plan, and obtaining approval from sponsors to proceed.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Plan information security activities for each project within the overall programme.

Cobit Code: BAI01.03 Manage stakeholder engagement.
Cobit omschrijving: Manage stakeholder engagement to ensure an active exchange of accurate, consistent and timely information that reaches all relevant stakeholders. This includes planning, identifying and engaging stakeholders and managing their expectations.

Cobit Code: BAI01.04 Develop and maintain the programme plan.
Cobit omschrijving: Formulate a programme to lay the initial groundwork and to position it for successful execution by formalising the scope of the work to be accomplished and identifying the deliverables that will satisfy its goals and deliver value. Maintain and update the programme plan and business case throughout the full economic life cycle of the programme, ensuring alignment with strategic objectives and reflecting the current status and updated insights gained to date.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Develop an information security plan that identifies the information security environment and controls to be implemented by the project team to protect organisational assets.

Cobit Code: BAI01.04 Develop and maintain the programme plan.
Cobit omschrijving: Formulate a programme to lay the initial groundwork and to position it for successful execution by formalising the scope of the work to be accomplished and identifying the deliverables that will satisfy its goals and deliver value. Maintain and update the programme plan and business case throughout the full economic life cycle of the programme, ensuring alignment with strategic objectives and reflecting the current status and updated insights gained to date.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Include the necessary resource(s) on projects to effectively identify and implement information security requirements.

Cobit Code: BAI01.05 Launch and execute the programme.
Cobit omschrijving: Launch and execute the programme to acquire and direct the resources needed to accomplish the goals and benefits of the programme as defined in the programme plan. In accordance with stage-gate or release review criteria, prepare for stage-gate, iteration or release reviews to report on the progress of the programme and to be able to make the case for funding up to the following stage-gate or release review.

Cobit Code: BAI01.06 Monitor, control and report on the programme outcomes.
Cobit omschrijving: Monitor and control programme (solution delivery) and enterprise (value/outcome) performance against plan throughout the full economic life cycle of the investment. Report this performance to the programme steering committee and the sponsors.

Cobit Code: BAI01.07 Start up and initiate projects within a programme.
Cobit omschrijving: Define and document the nature and scope of the project to confirm and develop amongst stakeholders a common understanding of project scope and how it relates to other projects within the overall IT-enabled investment programme. The definition should be formally approved by the programme and project sponsors.

Cobit Code: BAI01.08 Plan projects.
Cobit omschrijving: Establish and maintain a formal, approved integrated project plan (covering business and IT resources) to guide project execution and control throughout the life of the project. The scope of projects should be clearly defined and tied to building or enhancing business capability.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Integrate information security in IT and business project management.

Cobit Code: BAI01.09 Manage programme and project quality.
Cobit omschrijving: Prepare and execute a quality management plan, describes the programme and project quality approach and how it will be implemented. The plan should be formally reviewed and agreed on by all parties concerned and then incorporated into the integrated programme and project plans.

Cobit Code: BAI01.10 Manage programme and project risk.
Cobit omschrijving: Eliminate or minimise specific risk associated with programmes and projects through a systematic process of planning, identifying, analysing, responding to and monitoring and controlling the areas or events that have the potential to cause unwanted change. Risk faced by programme and project management should be established and centrally recorded.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Establish an information risk log and remediation actions to identified risk. Periodically review and update the risk log.

Cobit Code: BAI01.10 Manage programme and project risk.
Cobit omschrijving: Eliminate or minimise specific risk associated with programmes and projects through a systematic process of planning, identifying, analysing, responding to and monitoring and controlling the areas or events that have the potential to cause unwanted change. Risk faced by programme and project management should be established and centrally recorded.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Integrate information security projects in the enterprise’s programme and project management process.

Cobit Code: BAI01.11 Monitor and control projects.
Cobit omschrijving: Measure project performance against key project performance criteria such as schedule, quality, cost and risk. Identify any deviations from the expected. Assess the impact of deviations on the project and overall programme, and report results to key stakeholders.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Perform periodic independent assessments of projects to ensure that information security requirements are implemented effectively.

Cobit Code: BAI01.12 Manage project resources and work packages.
Cobit omschrijving: Manage project work packages by placing formal requirements on authorising and accepting work packages, and assigning and co-ordinating appropriate business and IT resources.

Cobit Code: BAI01.13 Close a project or iteration.
Cobit omschrijving: At the end of each project, release or iteration, require the project stakeholders to ascertain whether the project, release or iteration delivered the planned results and value. Identify and communicate any outstanding activities required to achieve the planned results of the project and the benefits of the programme, and identify and document lessons learned for use on future projects, releases, iterations and programmes.

Cobit Code: BAI01.14 Close a programme.
Cobit omschrijving: Remove the programme from the active investment portfolio when there is agreement that the desired value has been achieved or when it is clear it will not be achieved within the value criteria set for the programme.

Cobit Code: BAI02.01 Define and maintain business functional and technical requirements.
Cobit omschrijving: Based on the business case, identify, prioritise, specify and agree on business information, functional, technical and control requirements covering the scope/understanding of all initiatives required to achieve the expected outcomes of the proposed IT-enabled business solution.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Research, define and document information security requirements, i.e., confidentiality requirements, integrity requirements and availability requirements.

Cobit Code: BAI02.01 Define and maintain business functional and technical requirements.
Cobit omschrijving: Based on the business case, identify, prioritise, specify and agree on business information, functional, technical and control requirements covering the scope/understanding of all initiatives required to achieve the expected outcomes of the proposed IT-enabled business solution.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Research and analyse information security requirements with stakeholders, business sponsors and technical implementation personnel.

Cobit Code: BAI02.01 Define and maintain business functional and technical requirements.
Cobit omschrijving: Based on the business case, identify, prioritise, specify and agree on business information, functional, technical and control requirements covering the scope/understanding of all initiatives required to achieve the expected outcomes of the proposed IT-enabled business solution.
Cobit Vraag: 3. Ensure that the business requirements take into account the need to protect the security of information.

Cobit Code: BAI02.02 Perform a feasibility study and formulate alternative solutions.
Cobit omschrijving: Perform a feasibility study of potential alternative solutions, assess their viability and select the preferred option. If appropriate, implement the selected option as a pilot to determine possible improvements.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that information security requirements are included in the feasibility study.

Cobit Code: BAI02.03 Manage requirements risk.
Cobit omschrijving: Identify, document, prioritise and mitigate functional, technical and information processing-related risk associated with the enterprise requirements and proposed solution.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Perform an information risk assessment to identify the information security controls for the relevant business activities (programme and project management included).

Cobit Code: BAI02.03 Manage requirements risk.
Cobit omschrijving: Identify, document, prioritise and mitigate functional, technical and information processing-related risk associated with the enterprise requirements and proposed solution.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Co-operate with the risk office to manage the information risk.

Cobit Code: BAI02.04 Obtain approval of requirements and solutions.
Cobit omschrijving: Co-ordinate feedback from affected stakeholders and, at predetermined key stages, obtain business sponsor or product owner approval and sign-off on functional and technical requirements, feasibility studies, risk analyses and recommended solutions.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Validate information security requirements with stakeholders, business sponsors and technical implementation personnel.

Cobit Code: BAI03.01 Design high-level solutions.
Cobit omschrijving: Develop and document high-level designs using agreed-on and appropriate phased or rapid agile development techniques. Ensure alignment with the IT strategy and enterprise architecture. Reassess and update the designs when significant issues occur during detailed design or building phases or as the solution evolves. Ensure that stakeholders actively participate in the design and approve each version.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Define the information security specifications in line with high-level design.

Cobit Code: BAI03.02 Design detailed solution components.
Cobit omschrijving: Develop, document and elaborate detailed designs progressively using agreed-on and appropriate phased or rapid agile development techniques, addressing all components (business processes and related automated and manual controls, supporting IT applications, infrastructure services and technology products, and partners/suppliers). Ensure that the detailed design includes internal and external SLAs and OLAs.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Integrate information security design in the solution components.

Cobit Code: BAI03.03 Develop solution components.
Cobit omschrijving: Develop solution components progressively in accordance with detailed designs following development methods and documentation standards, standards. Ensure that all control requirements in the business processes, supporting IT applications and infrastructure services, services and technology products, and partners/suppliers are addressed.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that solution components integrate secure coding practices and secure infrastructure libraries.

Cobit Code: BAI03.04 Procure solution components.
Cobit omschrijving: Procure solution components based on the acquisition plan in accordance with requirements and detailed designs, architecture principles and standards, and the enterprise’s overall procurement and contract Ensure that all legal and contractual requirements are identified and addressed by the supplier.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that information security requirements are part of the procurement planning and appropriate information security assessments have been performed.

Cobit Code: BAI03.05 Build solutions.
Cobit omschrijving: Install and configure solutions and integrate with business process activities. Implement control, security and auditability measures during configuration, and during integration of hardware and infrastructural software, to protect resources and ensure availability and data integrity. Update the services catalogue to reflect the new solutions.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Verify that information security aspects are included in building the solution.

Cobit Code: BAI03.06 Perform quality assurance (QA).
Cobit omschrijving: Develop, resource and execute a QA plan aligned with the QMS to obtain the quality specified in the requirements definition and the enterprise’s quality policies and procedures.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Verify that information security aspects are included in quality assurance.

Cobit Code: BAI03.07 Prepare for solution testing.
Cobit omschrijving: Establish a test plan and required environments to test the individual and integrated solution components, including the business processes and supporting services, applications and infrastructure.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Include information security test cases in test plans.

Cobit Code: BAI03.08 Execute solution testing.
Cobit omschrijving: Execute testing continually during development, including control testing, in accordance with the defined test plan and development practices in the appropriate environment. Engage business process owners and end users in the test team. Identify, log and prioritise errors and issues identified during testing.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure information security of any production data used in test cases, including the use of a secure process to privatise sensitive data before use.

Cobit Code: BAI03.09 Manage changes to requirements.
Cobit omschrijving: Track the status of individual requirements (including all rejected requirements) throughout the project life cycle and manage the approval of changes to requirements.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Manage changes to information security aspects and requirements.

Cobit Code: BAI03.10 Maintain solutions.
Cobit omschrijving: Develop and execute a plan for the maintenance of solution and infrastructure components. Include periodic reviews against business needs and operational requirements.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that updates to information security requirements are reflected in the maintenance updates of solutions.

Cobit Code: BAI03.11 Define IT services and maintain the service portfolio.
Cobit omschrijving: Define and agree on new or changed IT services and service level options. Document new or changed service definitions and service level options to be updated in the services portfolio.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Define information security services in accordance with business needs and compliance/regulatory needs.

Cobit Code: BAI03.11 Define IT services and maintain the service portfolio.
Cobit omschrijving: Define and agree on new or changed IT services and service level options. Document new or changed service definitions and service level options to be updated in the services portfolio.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Define information security processes within IT services.

Cobit Code: BAI04.01 Assess current availability, performance and capacity and create a baseline.
Cobit omschrijving: Assess availability, performance and capacity of services and resources to ensure that cost-justifiable capacity and performance are available to support business needs and deliver against SLAs. Create availability, performance and capacity baselines for future comparison.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Identify the technical and procedural information security issues related to availability, performance and capacity.

Cobit Code: BAI04.02 Assess business impact.
Cobit omschrijving: Identify important services to the enterprise, map services and resources to business processes, and identify business dependencies. Ensure that the impact of unavailable resources is fully agreed-on and accepted by the customer. Ensure that, for vital business functions, the SLA availability requirements can be satisfied.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Assess the information security impact of potential unavailability, underperformance and lack of capacity.

Cobit Code: BAI04.03 Plan for new or changed service requirements.
Cobit omschrijving: Plan and prioritise availability, performance and capacity implications of changing business needs and service requirements.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Assess the impact of new or changed service requirements on information security.

Cobit Code: BAI04.04 Monitor and review availability and capacity.
Cobit omschrijving: Monitor, measure, analyse, report and review availability, performance and capacity. Identify deviations from established baselines. Review trend analysis reports identifying any significant issues and variances, initiating actions where necessary, and ensuring that all outstanding issues are followed up.

Cobit Code: BAI04.05 Investigate and address availability, performance and capacity issues.
Cobit omschrijving: Address deviations by investigating and resolving identified availability, performance and capacity issues.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Assess and investigate any information security issue that impacts availability, performance and capacity.

Cobit Code: BAI05.01 Establish the desire to change.
Cobit omschrijving: Understand the scope and impact of the envisioned change and stakeholder readiness/willingness to change. Identify actions to motivate stakeholders to accept and want to make the change work successfully.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Establish a proactive information security culture.

Cobit Code: BAI05.01 Establish the desire to change.
Cobit omschrijving: Understand the scope and impact of the envisioned change and stakeholder readiness/willingness to change. Identify actions to motivate stakeholders to accept and want to make the change work successfully.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Identify and communicate information security watch or pain points and desirable behaviours, and include changes needed to address these points.

Cobit Code: BAI05.01 Establish the desire to change.
Cobit omschrijving: Understand the scope and impact of the envisioned change and stakeholder readiness/willingness to change. Identify actions to motivate stakeholders to accept and want to make the change work successfully.
Cobit Vraag: 3. Provide visible leadership through executive (C-level, highest level) commitment to information security for facilitating change.

Cobit Code: BAI05.02 Form an effective implementation team.
Cobit omschrijving: Establish an effective implementation team by assembling appropriate members, creating trust, and establishing common goals and effectiveness measures.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Designate qualified information security professionals to serve on implementation teams.

Cobit Code: BAI05.02 Form an effective implementation team.
Cobit omschrijving: Establish an effective implementation team by assembling appropriate members, creating trust, and establishing common goals and effectiveness measures.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Develop a common vision for the information security team.

Cobit Code: BAI05.03 Communicate desired vision.
Cobit omschrijving: Communicate the desired vision for the change in the language of those affected by it. The communication should be made by senior management and include the rationale for, and benefits of, the change; the impacts of not making the change; and the vision, the road map and the involvement required of the various stakeholders.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Communicate the information security vision in support of the corporate vision statement.

Cobit Code: BAI05.04 Empower role players and identify short-term wins.
Cobit omschrijving: Empower those with implementation roles by ensuring that accountabilities are assigned, providing training, and aligning organisational structures and HR processes. Identify and communicate short-term wins that can be realised and are important from a change enablement perspective.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Align information security practices to support the vision.

Cobit Code: BAI05.04 Empower role players and identify short-term wins.
Cobit omschrijving: Empower those with implementation roles by ensuring that accountabilities are assigned, providing training, and aligning organisational structures and HR processes. Identify and communicate short-term wins that can be realised and are important from a change enablement perspective.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Assign clear responsibility for each person on the team and include performance criteria to establish accountability.

Cobit Code: BAI05.05 Enable operation and use.
Cobit omschrijving: Plan and implement all technical, operational and usage aspects such that all those who are involved in the future state environment can exercise their responsibility.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Develop practical information security measures.

Cobit Code: BAI05.06 Embed new approaches.
Cobit omschrijving: Embed the new approaches by tracking implemented changes, assessing the effectiveness of the operation and use plan, and sustaining ongoing awareness through regular communication. Take corrective measures as appropriate, which may include enforcing compliance.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Follow up on day-to-day information security awareness and adapt the measures accordingly.

Cobit Code: BAI05.07 Sustain changes.
Cobit omschrijving: Sustain changes through effective training of new staff, ongoing communication campaigns, continued top management commitment, adoption monitoring and sharing of lessons learned across the enterprise.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Inform and train new staff and provide refresh sessions regarding information security awareness.

Cobit Code: BAI06.01 Evaluate, prioritise and authorise change requests.
Cobit omschrijving: Evaluate all requests for change to determine the impact on business processes and IT services, and to assess whether change will adversely affect the operational environment and introduce unacceptable risk. Ensure that changes are logged, prioritised, categorised, assessed, authorised, planned and scheduled.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that assessment of the potential impact of changes on information security is undertaken.

Cobit Code: BAI06.01 Evaluate, prioritise and authorise change requests.
Cobit omschrijving: Evaluate all requests for change to determine the impact on business processes and IT services, and to assess whether change will adversely affect the operational environment and introduce unacceptable risk. Ensure that changes are logged, prioritised, categorised, assessed, authorised, planned and scheduled.
Cobit Vraag: 2. Ensure that the information security policy is adaptive to the business goals within an enterprise.

Cobit Code: BAI06.01 Evaluate, prioritise and authorise change requests.
Cobit omschrijving: Evaluate all requests for change to determine the impact on business processes and IT services, and to assess whether change will adversely affect the operational environment and introduce unacceptable risk. Ensure that changes are logged, prioritised, categorised, assessed, authorised, planned and scheduled.
Cobit Vraag: 3. Ensure that changes conform with the information security policy.

Cobit Code: BAI06.01 Evaluate, prioritise and authorise change requests.
Cobit omschrijving: Evaluate all requests for change to determine the impact on business processes and IT services, and to assess whether change will adversely affect the operational environment and introduce unacceptable risk. Ensure that changes are logged, prioritised, categorised, assessed, authorised, planned and scheduled.
Cobit Vraag: 4. Develop practices to consider the information security impact of emerging trends and technologies.

Cobit Code: BAI06.02 Manage emergency changes.
Cobit omschrijving: Carefully manage emergency changes to minimise further incidents and make sure the change is controlled and takes place securely. Verify that emergency changes are appropriately assessed and authorised after the change.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Develop measures that will address emergency changes and maintenance without compromising information security.

Cobit Code: BAI06.02 Manage emergency changes.
Cobit omschrijving: Carefully manage emergency changes to minimise further incidents and make sure the change is controlled and takes place securely. Verify that emergency changes are appropriately assessed and authorised after the change.
Cobit Vraag: 2. To assure proper follow-up, maintain an information risk register when new risk is introduced in an emergency change.

Cobit Code: BAI06.03 Track and report change status.
Cobit omschrijving: Maintain a tracking and reporting system to document rejected changes, communicate the status of approved and in-process changes, and complete changes. Make certain that approved changes are implemented as planned.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Address potential performance and capacity issues resulting from the proposed information security changes.

Cobit Code: BAI06.04 Close and document the changes.
Cobit omschrijving: Whenever changes are implemented, update accordingly the solution and user documentation and the procedures affected by the change.

Cobit Code: BAI07.01 Establish an implementation plan.
Cobit omschrijving: Establish an implementation plan that covers system and data conversion, acceptance testing criteria, communication, training, release preparation, promotion to production, early production support, a fallback/backout plan, and a post-implementation review. Obtain approval from relevant parties.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Include information security aspects in the acceptance and transition implementation plan.

Cobit Code: BAI07.02 Plan business process, system and data conversion.
Cobit omschrijving: Prepare for business process, IT service data and infrastructure migration as part of the enterprise’s development methods, including audit trails and a recovery plan should the migration fail.

Cobit Code: BAI07.03 Plan acceptance tests.
Cobit omschrijving: Establish a test plan based on enterprisewide standards that define roles, responsibilities, and entry and exit criteria. Ensure that the plan is approved by relevant parties.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that information security acceptance tests are part of the test plan.

Cobit Code: BAI07.04 Establish a test environment.
Cobit omschrijving: Define and establish a secure test environment representative of the planned business process and IT operations environment, performance and capacity, security, internal controls, operational practices, data quality and privacy requirements, and workloads.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that appropriate information security is in place for the test environment (e.g., anonymise sensitive data).

Cobit Code: BAI07.05 Perform acceptance tests.
Cobit omschrijving: Test changes independently in accordance with the defined test plan prior to migration to the live operational environment.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Develop and perform information security acceptance tests.

Cobit Code: BAI07.06 Promote to production and manage releases.
Cobit omschrijving: Promote the accepted solution to the business and operations. Where appropriate, run the solution as a pilot implementation or in parallel with the old solution for a defined period and compare behaviour and results. If significant problems occur, revert back to the original environment based on the fallback/backout plan. Manage releases of solution components.
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that information security is managed during promotion to production and release management.

Cobit Code: BAI07.07 Provide early production support.
Cobit omschrijving: Provide early support to the users and IT operations for an agreed-on period of time to deal with issues and help stabilise the new solution.

Cobit Code: BAI07.08 Perform a post-implementation review.
Cobit omschrijving: Conduct a post-implementation review to confirm outcome and results, identify lessons learned, and develop an action plan. Evaluate and check the actual performance and outcomes of the new or changed service against the predicted performance and outcomes (i.e., the service expected by the user or customer).
Cobit Vraag: 1. Ensure that information security is included in a post-implementation review.

Cobit Code: BAI08.01 Nurture and facilitate a knowledge-sharing culture.

Cobit Code: BAI08.02 Identify and classify sources of information.

Cobit Code: BAI08.04 Use and share knowledge.
Cobit omschrijving: Propagate available knowledge resources to relevant stakeholders and communicate how these resources can be used to address different needs (e.g., problem solving, learning, strategic planning and decision making).

Cobit Code: BAI08.05 Evaluate and retire information.
Cobit omschrijving: Measure the use and evaluate the currency and relevance of information. Retire obsolete information.

Cobit Code: BAI09.01 Identify and record current assets.

Cobit Code: BAI09.02 Manage critical assets.

Cobit omschrijving: Manage assets from procurement to disposal to ensure that assets are utilised as effectively and efficiently as possible and are accounted for and physically protected.
